comments:
When I open "Team Synchronizing" view, I receive the following message: "An error has occured. See error log for more details". When Team Synchronization view is opened, no icons and no labels source tree nodes are shown. Every time I click on any tree node I receive error message descibed above. Source tree node actions are working: I'm able to synchronize workspace, perform CVS update and CVS commit.

Error log file contains the following exceptions:

Source tree screenshot
The most likely cause of this is a corrupt download. Please download Eclipse again and see if that helps.
It's rather strange. This problem was resolved after workstation restart.
